sentences.en: He was treated with penicillin injections.
One dose of penicillin can wipe out the infection.
sentences.cn: 一剂青霉素即可消除感染。

sentences.en: Farmers often give penicillin to beef and poultry, and because of this, penicillin has been found in the milk of treated cows.
sentences.cn: 农民经常给牛肉和家禽注射青霉素，正因为如此，在被注射过青霉素的奶牛的奶中发现了青霉素。
